bullets.text: U.S. labor demand cooled: December job openings trended down while hires and separations changed little, consistent with a gradually easing labor market.
January layoff announcements hit the worst start-of-year level since 2009, signaling sharper corporate cost-cutting and potential labor-market weakening ahead.
Amazon projected roughly $200B spending, raising AI capex stakes; investors punished margins and guidance risk, sending shares sharply lower after an earnings miss.
Tech risk-off broadened: software stocks fell for an eighth straight session and Asia’s Kospi led regional declines after a Wall Street tech rout.
Bitcoin sold off to post-election lows with ~15% drops and sharp volatility; the broader crypto complex reportedly shed about $2T, testing “HODL” strategies.
U.S. Senate crypto legislation talks accelerated after a key vote, potentially shifting oversight and market structure toward clearer CFTC-style regulation.
White House launched TrumpRx direct-to-consumer drug site; analysts argue limited ability to lower most U.S. prices without insurer/pharmacy-benefit leverage.
Canada increased EV investments as Trump trade policy disrupts North American autos; policy uncertainty is pressuring cross-border supply chains and automaker strategy.
At Ukraine’s request, Starlink blocked Russian troop internet access, underscoring how private satellite networks have become strategic levers in modern warfare.
Trump called for a new nuclear arms-control treaty as existing frameworks lapse, increasing near-term strategic uncertainty around U.S.-Russia nuclear limits.
Large-scale breaches expanded: Conduent exposure reportedly grew to millions more Americans; Substack also confirmed user contact-data leakage—raising systemic identity-risk.
Scientists identified hidden deep-Earth structures influencing Earth’s magnetic field, improving understanding of geodynamo dynamics and long-horizon geomagnetic risk.
A new nasal vaccine showed strong protection against H5N1 bird flu, a potentially important tool for pandemic preparedness and transmission reduction.
